Package suncertify.client

Interface Summary
FlightsModelListener Contract between the Model and its listeners (Views), -- Observable-Observer
 

Class Summary
ColoredTableCellRenderer This class extends DefaultTableCellRenderer and overrides only just one method: setValue().
DataAccessFacade DataAccessFacade provides an easy and effective way to getting information about the database.
DataAccessFactory A class can provides factory methods takes care of the creating of the objects that will be available to the access of services provided to the user interface on the client application.
DataController This class is addressed to represent the controller to user interface of application.
DataModel Implements bussiness rules for booking and searching flights used by the underlying model and others truly services such as getting schema, origin airports and destin airports.
DataView User interface indicates the main view of available flights and all functionality necessary for booking and searching of flights, throught by usage of controls, such as buttons and comboboxes.
FBNMain The Fly by night services application loader.
FlightData This class encapsulates a unit that describes a specified flight.
MVCConstructor Takes care launches the application in the local or remote mode, after create it according to Model-View-Controller pattern
NotificationType A simple utility class to hold the ids of events
 

Exception Summary
FBNException Holds all exceptions that may occur in the FBNMain
